name: melody from ~ Legato
description:
"Years ago, a force of darkness came and swept away a planet. The casualty was but one of many, but the Council governing over the universe enacted a plan so that this calamity could be stopped once and for all."

Welcome to melody from ~ Legato, a quaint, original role-playing game where protagonist Aoi Himura sets out on a journey with Legato to save the world from a fate once endured years ago. But, though the voyage may have one destination, the path that determines the future may be less straightforward than Aoi anticipated.
